= Addons Path Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to addons path configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/addons_path.adoc[]


[[option_addons_path]]
== addons_path
NOTE: specify additional addons paths

Odoo cli used:

* --addons-path

The environment variable `ADDONS_PATH` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_csv[`csv`] value.

.Example
****
Possible values :

* `ADDONS_PATH="value1,value2"`
* `ADDONS_PATH="value1"`

[TIP]
====
The value are automatically deduplicated. +
`ADDONS_PATH="value1,value2"` and `ADDONS_PATH="value2,value1,value2"` are the same.
====

****
